channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Come Face to Face With the Best Nature Photography of the Year
item.description: Nature really has a lot to say, if we're willing to take a closer look.

item.title: Fibre et forfait mobile : comment économiser des dizaines d’euros chaque mois avec SFR ? [Sponso]
item.description: La fibre pas chère, des services TV complets et des réductions importantes sur un forfait mobile : avec SFR Fibre Starter, l’opérateur répond à tous vos besoins à moindres frais.

item.title: George R.R. Martin Wanted ‘Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ to Keep Dunk’s Knight Status as Vague as Possible
item.description: No matter what you think the season finale showed, don't expect 'Knight of the Seven Kingdoms' to confirm or deny Dunk's knighthood any time soon.

item.title: MAGA Is Raging Over the Epstein Files. But They're Not Mad at Donald Trump
item.description: Trump supporters are angry at the lack of arrests after the latest Epstein file dump, but have targeted their ire at Kash Patel, Pam Bondi, and Steve Bannon rather than the president.

item.title: Kalshi Suspended a California Politician and a YouTuber for Insider Trading
item.description: Leading prediction market Kalshi has revealed details of two recent insider trading cases it flagged to authorities, giving a rare look at how the platform enforces its policies.

item.title: Have hard-won scaling lessons to share? Take the stage at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026
item.description: Apply to speak at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 by April 17 for a chance to lead a roundtable or breakout session for 1,000 founders and investors. If you’ve built, backed, or operated inside high-growth startups, your experience could shape how the next wave of founders scales.

item.title: The Commodore 64 Ultimate takes me back to my very first days with a computer and I loved nearly every moment
item.description: More than just an emulation of the iconic home computer, the Commodore 64 Ultimate is a fantastic project for fans of that era. It’ll take some practice and memory recall from a bygone time, but it’s worth pursuing with some great quality of life improvements.

item.title: RAM shortage? Australian outfit sells server with 1TB RAM and four Xeon CPUs for $1200 — Decade-old powerhouse has rare Intel SSD, two redundant 1.1kW PSUs and is worth thousands more in parts
item.description: This Dell PowerEdge R820 probably cost one hundred times more when it went on sale back in the early 2010s; it is an absolute bargain, a true one-off.

item.title: About 12% of U.S. teens turn to AI for emotional support or advice
item.description: General purpose tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Grok are not designed for this use, making mental health professionals wary.

item.title: Fanttik’s foldable V10 Apex vacuum is on sale for the lowest price we’ve seen
item.description: We spend a lot of time at The Verge talking about robot vacuums — robovacs that can mop, robovacs that perfume your home, robovacs with arms, etc., etc. — but they’re not good for everything. A reliable handheld vac is still a good option for cleaning everything from car seats to stairs, which is why […]

item.title: This new cybercrime platform lets hackers run malicious Google Ads and hide from Google's screening process
item.description: 1Campaign has been around for three years and comes with a fancy dashboard.

item.title: Americans now listen to podcasts more often than talk radio, study shows
item.description: Recent findings also show that video podcasting -- while popular -- is not necessarily replacing audio shows.

item.title: Visual imitation learning: Guidde trains AI agents on human 'expert video' instead of documentation
item.description: For years, the "last mile" of digital transformation has been littered with forgotten PDFs and ignored training manuals. Organizations spend millions on sophisticated software like SAP or Salesforce, only for employees to struggle with basic navigation. Now, as the era of agentic AI arrives, companies face a double-edged sword: they must teach human employees to collaborate with AI, while simultaneously teaching AI agents to navigate the labyrinthine interfaces of the modern enterprise. One idea that seems to be gaining momentum among AI-forward businesses: using screen recordings and tutorial...

item.title: Windscribe launches stealth VPN app to beat censorship in Iran and Russia
item.description: Windscribe has released a specialized app update designed to restore access for users facing severe internet restrictions. Here's how to get it.

item.title: Why enterprise security now depends on independence, not upgrades
item.description: It is a change-management decision with financial, operational, and risk consequences.

item.title: Amazon’s AGI lab leader is leaving
item.description: After less than two years at Amazon, David Luan, the head of Amazon's San Francisco AI lab, is departing the company. Luan announced the update in a post on LinkedIn on Tuesday, saying, "I'll be leaving Amazon at the end of this week to cook up something new." He added that, "There's incredible work to […]

item.title: HP admits RAM crisis has got so bad, memory now accounts for 35% of the cost of its PCs
item.description: HP has 'qualified new suppliers' as RAM crisis intensifies — memory now accounts for 35% of the cost of its PCs.

item.title: QHD, 21:9, 160 Hz : massif et immersif, ce moniteur gaming LG de 34″ chute sous les 300 €
item.description: Avec sa grande dalle incurvée qui offre des visuels bien nets et fluides, l'écran PC LG UltraGear 34G600A-B a de quoi satisfaire les joueurs les plus assidus. Actuellement, PC Componentes le propose en plus à 296,80 euros au lieu de 399,99 euros.

item.title: OpenAI is testing a $100-a-month version of ChatGPT — and it finally fills a big gap
item.description: OpenAI is preparing a new $100 ChatGPT Pro Lite tier aimed at users who need more power than Plus offers

item.title: Finalement, Windows 11 continuera de prendre en charge les vieilles imprimantes
item.description: Ouf ! Les vieilles imprimantes ne finiront pas (tout de suite) à la décharge. Après avoir semé une certaine confusion chez ses clients, Microsoft a finalement annoncé que les pilotes historiques pour les imprimantes continueront d'être pris en charge dans Windows 11.

item.title: The rise of the Chief Trust Officer: A game changing new C-suite role
item.description: Trust is no longer a 'nice to have' for businesses - but whose responsibility is it?

item.title: Things Won’t Change for Xbox Nearly as Much as You Think
item.description: The next Xbox console will still be a PC, whether it has the blades dashboard or not.

item.title: Écrans OLED : TCL lance le « Super Pixel » pour détrôner Samsung sur son propre terrain
item.description: TCL CSOT sort de son chapeau la technologie Super Pixel. Promettant une netteté accrue et une consommation d'énergie réduite, cette innovation s'accompagne d'une accélération de la production d'OLED par jet d'encre.

item.title: We played Resident Evil Requiem, ask us anything
item.description: One of the first blockbuster games of the year is almost here - and it's a creepy one. Resident Evil Requiem launches on February 27th, and it's the first all-new RE game since Village in 2021. It's also a fascinating experience, one that combines the guns-blazing action of Resident Evil 4 with the first-person terror […]

item.title: Walmart drops heavily discounted Pokémon TCG Journey Together Booster Bundles — how to buy now
item.description: Walmart has dropped the Pokémon TCG Scarlet and Violet Journey Together Booster Bundle for less on Feb. 25.

item.title: Alex Kurtzman Learned to Put the Stars of ‘Starfleet Academy’ in Danger From an Unlikely Source
item.description: The final frontier is a lot like Grey-Sloan Memorial, when you think about it.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem is the best of both terrifying worlds
item.description: Resident Evil has always been a strange creature: Like many of its most notable monsters, it has shifted and evolved into various forms. From its blocky days of tank-controlled Z-list actors to first-person fright fests, the franchise's identity is not so much tied to genre as theme: zombies, viruses, very ugly monsters. Now, with Requiem, […]

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem is still scary as hell on the Switch 2
item.description: It took me a while to recover from the first big scare in Resident Evil Requiem. There I was, hunched over with a screen inches from my face and headphones in my ears, when a gigantic woman began chasing me through a dimly lit hallway intent on, well, eating me. It was a heart-racing sequence, […]

item.title: 3 days left: Save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket
item.description: Just 3 days left to save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket. Offer ends on Friday, February 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Don't miss unparalleled, curated networking and valuable insights from 250+ tech leaders, and discover 300+ breakout innovations. Register now.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Thursday, February 26 (game #725)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem is a blast, but after 30 years it's time the series' narrative let go of the past
item.description: Resident Evil Requiem offers a good mix of survival horror and action in its first half, but the bombastic latter sequences and sloppy plot stray a little too far from those strong foundations.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Thursday, February 26 (game #991)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Thursday, February 26 (game #1494)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: How to watch Scrubs S10 online from anywhere – stream revival of Zach Braff's classic medical sitcom
item.description: Our guide explains how to watch Scrubs season 10 online and stream episodes wherever you are as J.D. and co make their long awaited return to Sacred Heart.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem review: Entertaining nostalgia slop
item.description: A review of "Resident Evil Requiem" from Capcom.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem est magnifique en 4K et Path Tracing, la preuve en images
item.description: Resident Evil Requiem est enfin là et inaugure une nouvelle étape pour le moteur maison de Capcom, le RE Engine. Ce nouvel opus profite du Path Tracing pour la première fois avec un rendu visuel encore jamais vu à ce niveau. La preuve en vidéo et en photos.

item.title: US tells diplomats to lobby against foreign data sovereignty laws
item.description: The Trump administration has ordered U.S. diplomats to lobby against countries' attempts to regulate how American tech companies handle foreigners' data.

item.title: Test du Ecovacs Winbot W3 Omni : le laveur de vitre qui se prend pour une machine à laver
item.description: Déjà établie sur le marché des laveurs de vitres, Ecovacs ne veut pas se laisser devancer par la concurrence et innove avec la nouvelle génération de Winbot. Celle-ci s'attaque au lavage de la microfibre, en automatisant le processus grâce à une machine à laver, désormais intégrée au robot laveur de vitres. Voyons si cette innovation change vraiment la donne dans ce test complet. ...

item.title: State of the Union takeaways: Sales mode, heavy on patriotism, and a dark turn on Democrats
item.description: Much of the nation is worried about the direction of the economy, but Trump insisted in his address to Congress that rising costs are no longer a problem. President Donald Trump started in sales mode, using his State of the Union address to deliver an upbeat vision of the U.S. economy.

item.title: I Want My Remains Kept Inside Spotify and Liquid Death’s Speaker Urn
item.description: Dying to get inside this morbid Bluetooth speaker marketing gimmick.

item.title: Découvrez les nouveaux Samsung Galaxy S26 en direct sur Twitch dès 18h30
item.description: La première Samsung Galaxy Unpacked de l’année a lieu ce mercredi 25 février 2026, à partir de 19h. Frandroid couvre évidemment cette grande conférence où seront présentés les nouveaux Galaxy S26. Sans grande surprise, nous serons en direct sur notre chaîne Twitch Frandroidlive à partir de 18h30.

item.title: En attendant les annonces d’Apple, l’Apple Watch Series 11 dans son format XXL est à prix cassé sur Amazon
item.description: Rarement en promotion depuis son lancement, l’Apple Watch Series 11 refait enfin surface à prix réduit. La montre connectée haut de gamme d’Apple s’affiche aujourd’hui à 409 euros dans son grand format 46 mm, contre 479 euros habituellement.

item.title: Xiaomi’s magnetic power bank is incredibly thin
item.description: It was originally teased to be announced at Mobile World Congress 2026 in Barcelona, Spain, this weekend, but Xiaomi has already shared all the details for its new super slim wireless power bank on its Australian website. The Xiaomi UltraThin Magnetic Power Bank 5000 features a 5,000mAh battery, as the name implies, and is just […]

item.title: Panera Bread is taking a cue from McDonald’s. Here’s what you can get with its first-ever $5 value menu
item.description: With affordability still top of mind for many consumers, the fast casual chain is offering lower price points as part of a turnaround effort. It’s no secret that fast casual restaurants have struggled in recent years, with some companies turning to cheaper options as a way to lure customers back.

item.title: Discord remet la vérification d’âge à plus tard sur fond de polémique
item.description: La messagerie Discord recule face aux contestations des utilisateurs concernant le système de vérification d'âge.

item.title: WhatsApp va (enfin) vous laisser protéger votre compte avec un vrai mot de passe
item.description: Vous pensiez que sécuriser une application de messagerie avec un vrai mot de passe était une évidence ? Pas pour WhatsApp, qui aura attendu seize longues années avant de s'y mettre. L'application de Meta prépare enfin l'intégration de ce bouclier classique pour contrer les piratages de comptes.

item.title: La mémoire pèse désormais 35 % du coût d’un PC chez HP
item.description: La mémoire représente une part de plus en plus importante dans la facture des composants des PC vendus par HP. Le constructeur rassure cependant sur son approvisionnement, qui est assuré pour l'année 2026. Mais ensuite ?

item.title: Bridging the AI-CRM Gap: How mid-market businesses can get ahead in 2026
item.description: The CEO of Workbooks shares his thoughts on how businesses can get ahead in 2026 with AI/CRM integration.

item.title: Does Anthropic think Claude is alive? Define ‘alive’
item.description: Over the past several weeks, as more and more Anthropic executives do interviews on a publicity blitz for Claude, one thing has gotten increasingly clear: Anthropic sure seems to think Claude is alive in some way, shape, or form. "Alive" is obviously a loaded term; the more frequently used word is "conscious." If you ask […]

item.title: ‘This is an AI arms race’ — CrowdStrike warns attackers are moving through networks in under 30 minutes and ‘security teams must operate faster than the adversary to win’
item.description: Breakout time is the clearest signal of how intrusion has changed, researchers say, as they see data exfiltration within minutes of initial compromise.

item.title: Fuite à la CAF : les données des bénéficiaires au RSA ont été piratées
item.description: Une nouvelle cyberattaque secoue l'État français. En piratant un service de l'État, un cybercriminel est parvenu à voler des informations relatives à la CAF (Caisse d'Allocations Familiales). Les données des bénéficiaires au RSA ont été compromises, dont le numéro de sécurité sociale, le matricule allocataire, et les coordonnées complètes.

item.title: Apple brings age verification to UK users in iOS 26.4 beta
item.description: Apple is bringing age verification to the UK, as the latest iOS 26.4 beta prompts users to verify that they're over 18 following installation. As shown in screenshots posted to Reddit, Apple says users who don't confirm their age "will not be able to download and purchase apps or make in-app purchases." In one of […]

item.title: 'Basically zero' — top Goldman Sachs economist says AI barely had any positive effect on the US economy in 2025
item.description: Though AI's impact on the US economy might not have been so big, it's certainly set to continue rising globally.
